title: At the Edge of Town
description: When a college student is found dead after a party, his mother is determined to try to find out what happened. With the help of a new friend, she manages to get the case in front of a jury. Dennis Murphy reports on the unexpected twist that no one saw coming.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
